# Systematic global assessment of reef fish communities by the Reef Life Survey program

+ Article [url](https://www.nature.com/articles/sdata20147), Open Access, for the description of the data set.

+ Data availability: 
  + Record 1 (recommended): https://portal.aodn.org.au/search, search for *'IMOS - National Reef Monitoring Network Sub-Facility - Global reef fish abundance and biomass'*
  + Record 2 (not updated): [figshare](https://figshare.com/collections/Systematic_global_assessment_of_reef_fish_communities_by_the_Reef_Life_Survey_program/934319)
  
+ Data use: full or partial

> CITATION: Edgar G.J., Stuart-Smith R.D. (2014) Systematic global assessment of reef fish communities by the Reef Life Survey program. Scientific Data, 140007.
